document.full_text: dirk nowitzki made a layup with three seconds to play as dallas rallied from a 15-point deficit in the final quarter.
document.title: finals | mavericks 95, heat 93: nowitzki pulls dallas out of hole to new life
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki made a layup with three seconds to play as dallas rallied from a 15-point deficit in the final quarter.
